name: Into the Lights
description:
This game was created using GameMaker Studio 2 over a few weeks in June of 2020 for the Portland Indie Game Squad (PIGSquad) July Summer Slow Jam. The technical theme was "music first" and the creative theme was "ghost notes"; we hope you enjoy our stage lighting game/toybox!

The core of the game consists of three songs which total a little over 8 minutes;  the entire experience can be played through in roughly 15 minutes.

Player Input:

  • Mouse cursor & Left click
  • TAB to restart
  • ESC to quit

Credits:

  • Audio Designer & Composer:   Jef Drawbaugh
  • Character Artist & Animator:   Soren Mathison
  • Environment & Lighting Artist:   Sarah Landstrom
  • Concept Designer & Programmer:   Pete Vellucci Jr

Technical Note:

  • This game was programmed at a default 1920x1080 resolution and coded around the 16:9 aspect ratio. Playing on a display with a different ratio may produce undesired visual issues.
